sections.content:
You are the Sheriff of Nottingham, inspecting merchants at the city gate.
Your job is to catch smugglers while maintaining your reputation.

sections.title: ğŸ“¦ GAMEPLAY:
sections.content:
1. Merchants arrive and declare their goods
2. Observe their behavior for "tells" (signs of honesty or lying)
3. Some nervous merchants may offer bribes proactively
4. Decide your action:
   â€¢ Accept bribe (if offered) - Take gold, let them pass
   â€¢ Threaten to inspect - Enter negotiation
   â€¢ Inspect immediately - Check their bag
   â€¢ Let them pass - Trust them

â€¢ Multi-round haggling is possible

sections.title: âš–ï¸  REPUTATION:
sections.content:
â€¢ Catching smugglers: +1 reputation, +1 experience
â€¢ Inspecting honest merchants: -1 reputation
â€¢ Trusting honest merchants: +1 reputation
â€¢ Missing smugglers: -2 reputation
â€¢ Accepting bribes: -1 reputation (but you get gold!)

sections.title: ğŸ­ MERCHANT PERSONALITIES:
sections.content:
â€¢ Cautious: Offer generous bribes, nervous behavior
â€¢ Bold: Risk-takers, may refuse to bribe
â€¢ Greedy: Offer minimal bribes, give up easily
â€¢ Each merchant has unique tells and traits

sections.title: ğŸ’¡ TIPS:
sections.content:
â€¢ Watch for tells - they hint at honesty or deception
â€¢ Cautious merchants bribe even with legal goods
â€¢ Bold merchants sometimes refuse to bribe entirely
â€¢ Bribes are based on goods value and personality
â€¢ Build reputation to become more intimidating
